document_data.mainbody:
Rendrils Forge was a metalworking smithy in the city of Procampur in the Vast in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
It was found on Shards Street in the Port District.
By 1358 DR, the business was owned by Opara Rendril, a master metalsmith who, in particular, crafted high-quality longswords and helms, while her bracelets and belt-daggers were famous around the Inner Sea.
